sentences.en: Exquisite workmanship is the outstanding characteristic of these artistic handwork's.
sentences.cn: 工艺精美是这些工艺品的突出特点.

sentences.en: He accused the garage of shoddy workmanship on the bodywork.
sentences.cn: 他指责汽车修理厂车身修理工艺拙劣.

sentences.en: He stressed that workmanship and quality were more important than quantity for industrial production.
sentences.cn: 他强调:在工业生产中,产品工艺和质量比数量更加重要.

sentences.en: I was admiring the exquisite workmanship in the mosaic.
sentences.cn: 我当时正在欣赏镶嵌画的精致做工.

sentences.en: Our buyers insist on high standards of workmanship and materials.
sentences.cn: 我们的买主对工艺和材料坚持要高标准。

sentences.en: Some of the workmanship on bone was extraordinarily fine.
sentences.cn: 骨器制作的手艺有些极为高超.

sentences.en: The bracelet was made with exquisite workmanship.
sentences.cn: 这只手躅做得巧夺天工.

sentences.en: The finish and workmanship of the woodwork was excellent.
sentences.cn: 这件木工品的抛光和做工均属上乘。

sentences.en: The problem may be due to poor workmanship.
sentences.cn: 问题可能在于工艺太差。

sentences.en: The standard of workmanship is very high.
The vase is of matchless workmanship.
sentences.cn: 这只花瓶的做工精美无比.

sentences.en: They have a hatred of bad workmanship.
sentences.cn: 他们很讨厌低劣的工艺品.

sentences.en: This vase is a piece of exquisite workmanship.
We've received a lot of complaints of bad workmanship.
sentences.cn: 很多人向我们投诉产品工艺低劣.

words.tran_cn: 技术熟练的；精工细作的

trans.tran_en: skill in making things, especially in a way that makes them look good
